ModMetaData.name: Guns and Grenades Tech Removal
ModMetaData.author: KapTaiN_KaVerN
ModMetaData.description:
<size=20>For all your medieval or tribal plays</size>
Remove all guns (and grenades) in pawn generation process AND remove all mechanoids raids - You still have to use scenario options if you want to completely remove mechanoids events(poisonship and psychicship)
<size=20>Credit</size>
Thank you to Reddit User kcirdor for the testing and his insights
